#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstdlib>

#define lim 51

int check(int arr[lim][lim],int i,int j,int n,int m)
{
	if(i>=0&&i<m&&j>=0&&j<n&&arr[i][j]==0)
		return 1;
	else
		return 0;
}	
using namespace std;

{

	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);

		for(int j=0;j<m;j++)

			arr[i][j] = 0;

				{

			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		i = n-1;
		j=n-1;
		while(total>0)
		{
			if(check(arr,i,j,n,m))
			{
				arr[i][j] = total;
				if(flag==0)
				{
					j--;

				else if(flag==1)
				{
					i--;

				else if(flag==2)

			{

		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
